title: DRUG DEVICE COMBINATION TYPE
description:
As defined in the Directive 2001/83/EC, medicinal products can be marketed for use in combination with a medical device, usually to enable the delivery of the medicine. Information on the medical device, based on the elements described in this section should be provided when the medicinal product is presented in combination with medical devices. Overall, there are two types of combination:
•	integral: the medicinal product and device form a single integrated product e.g. pre-filled syringes and pre-filled pens, certain types of patches for transdermal drug delivery and pre-filled inhalers;
•	co-packaged: the medicinal product and the device are separate items contained in the same pack e.g. reusable pen for insulin cartridges, tablet delivery system with controller for pain management.
In addition, the device may be combined with the medicinal product and support the pharmacological/metabolic/immunological action of the medicinal product (collagen scaffold). In these cases, the device’s purpose goes beyond the administration and supports the mechanism of action of the medicinal product. These types of devices are considered an integral part of the pharmaceutical product administered to the patient and are not subject to this list.
Classification of type of a Drug Device Combination towards EMA

refId.title: referenceDataId
refId.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

name.title: name
name.description:
The term is the human readable unique name typically used in drop down menus of applications. 
In cases when the complete name is too long, then a meaningful abbreviation is created for the term.
English is the leading Language.

shortDescription.title: shortDescription
shortDescription.description:
The Short Description is the human readable unique and complete name. In cases when the complete name fits into the Short Description then it is identical to the Long Description.
English is the leading Language.

longDescription.title: longDescription
longDescription.description:
The description provides all information needed for business to understand the meaning of the provided term. 
English is the leading Language.

lastChangeDate.title: lastChangeDate
lastChangeDate.description: Last Change Date is the timestamp when any value of the reference data record has been changed or created.

lastChangingUser.title: lastChangingUser
lastChangingUser.description: Last Changing User is the last Boehringer employee or external person that changed or created the reference data record in the system.

sourcesRefId.title: sourceOfInformations
sourcesRefId.description:
SOURCE OF INFORMATION describes who defined specific Reference Data.
The Source can be an external or internal standard.

items.title: referenceDataId
items.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

disabledAttributes.title: disabledAttributes
disabledAttributes.description: a list of disabled misc attributes in this dataset

items.description: a list of disabled misc attributes in this dataset

sapCode.title: sapCode
sapCode.description: The SAP Code is the unique identifier from SAP to identity the data record.
